sourceMeaningMnemonic: Your <radical>leader</radical> is very <radical>anti</radical>-everything, making it all <kanji>temporary</kanji>. You get a new shirt, "I'm anti shirts!" she yells, and out it goes.
meaningInfo: She tires of things so quickly, you hardly have time to get used to them before they're gone.
readingMnemonic: The leader's most <kanji>temporary</kanji> possession is her <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). Or... cars, because they're all very temporary. She buys one, drives it around, and then suddenly she's anti red car. She needs a blue one!
readingInfo: Picture all of the temporary cars she's tried filling up an entire junkyard. They're all a little different, but in the end they were all just temporary fads.
